name: SCV Ready - A Starcraft Story
description:
Created during an impromptu online jam alongside the 2018 Global Game jam.

You are the last remaining SCV of a Terran player who has gone AFK and left marines on queue. Fund their construction while the Zerg player ominously surrounds your doomed base.

SCV Ready is a weekends worth of effort between 2 artists to make a dumb Starcraft joke that stops being funny after 5 seconds. 

Requires a gamepad to play.
